price: Neka je hvaljen Allah, Čije je sve ono na nebesima i sve ono na Zemlji! Hvaljen neka bude i na onom svijetu! On je Mudri i Sveznajući.
arabic: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi walahu al-ḥamdu fī al-ākhirati wahuwa al-ḥakīmu al-khabīru
